meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inhumane.
meanings.sent1: The inhumanness of his actions shocked everyone at the shelter.
meanings.sent2: Her inhumanness towards the stray animals was truly heartbreaking.
meanings.sent3: Despite his inhumanness, he had a soft spot for injured birds.
meanings.sent4: The inhumanness of the situation left a bitter taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The inhumanness of the dictator's rule will never be forgotten.

meanings.definition: The lack of compassion or kindness towards others.
meanings.sent1: The inhumanness in her eyes made him uneasy.
meanings.sent2: His inhumanness towards his classmates made him unpopular.
meanings.sent3: Despite her inhumanness, she always remembered to feed the stray cats.
meanings.sent4: The inhumanness of his words cut deeper than any insult.
meanings.sent5: The inhumanness of the bully's actions left a lasting impact on the school.
